We are looking to create a platform that helps people manage their chronic illnesses. We are looking for an experienced site reliability engineer to join our team and help scale, streamline, and improve all levels of our technology stack. As a newer employee of our company, you will have an opportunity to make a hands-on dynamic impact on the business and how we change the way healthcare helps individuals.

Contribute and maintain CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure
Build and develop tools to deliver safe and quick features
Debug issues in distributed systems
Work cross-functionally

AWS
C#/ .NET | prefferably .NET Core
CI/CD
Kubernetes
IaC Tools like Terraform
Jenikins
Network protocols (firewalls, routing, proxies)
What's In It for You
Competitive base salary and overall compensation package

401 (K) with generous company match
Vacation, sick, and paid holidays
Life Insurance coverage
